column2: HAAP Community Engagement (e.g. doing educational sessions, releasing how-to videos, booths at community events, outreach to community organizations, etc)

column20: What other topics would you like us to focus on, if any?

shortages on the outer islands and in Oahu rural areas. Can we get our congressional reps to get something into law where private docs can hire new docs and if they stay for a period of time, in a shortage area, give them the ability to write off their student loans?
children back in achool without masks

column21: improved resources to prevent childhood obesity (nutrition, physical activity, obesity clinic, etc)

column20: Helping primary care to save the medical home....  but it seems the new normal is we all work for HPH and employees...  maybe this is why support is limited.
